"/api/auth/login" : "/api/auth/signup"; } const response = await fetch(endpoint, { method: "POST", headers: { "Content-Type": "application/json" }, body: JSON.stringify(payload), }); const data = await response.json(); alert(data.message || "Success!"); }; return (
